input.sentences: a mexican-theme party was thrown at an office .
folding tables were set up on which the food was placed .
the food consisted of tacos | beans and chips .
a pinata hung from the ceiling .
a blind-folded man was able to hit and break the pinata .
output.sentences: I got a lot of compliments on the poncho I wore to the costume party.
And of course I helped myself to the party food.
Cheesy fried goodness is my ultimate weakness.
The flavors exploded in my mouth like the pinata from earlier in the party.
And like the darkness beneath the blindfolds, a wave of sinister energy passed through me.
